meanings.definition: The process of introducing carbon into a solid iron-based material to increase its hardness and strength.
meanings.sent2: The carburizations of the steel made it more durable.
meanings.sent3: The carburizations of the iron turned it into a superhero metal!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the carburizations of steel, making her unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The carburizations of the metal were like adding a shield of strength.

meanings.definition: The act of treating a metal with carbon to improve its surface properties.
meanings.sent1: The carburizations of the metal changed its surface.
meanings.sent2: Carburizations can enhance the appearance of metal.
meanings.sent3: The carburizations of the steel gave it a shiny makeover.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like the carburizations of metal, brightening everything around her.
meanings.sent5: The carburizations of the metal were like a magic touch, transforming it completely.

meanings.definition: The result of a material being carburized.
meanings.sent1: The carburizations of the iron were evident in its strength.
meanings.sent2: After carburizations, the metal showed improved properties.
meanings.sent3: The carburizations of the steel were like a surprise gift inside.
meanings.sent4: His words had the impact of carburizations, leaving a lasting impression.
meanings.sent5: The carburizations of the material were like a secret power waiting to be revealed.
